history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_reg_r,plus,opp. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_reg_r,plus,opp. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_opp_r,plus_reg_r,opp,plus. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_opp_r,plus_reg_r,opp,plus,plus_zero_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_opp_r,plus_reg_r,opp,plus,plus_zero_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_opp_r,plus_reg_r,opp,plus,plus_zero_r. qsimpl time: 1 use: plus_assoc,plus_opp_r,plus_reg_r,opp,plus,plus_zero_r.

exceptions.tactic: apply plus_reg_r with (r := plus y (opp y)).
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing x : K y : abs x = 0 The term "y" has type "abs x = 0" while it is expected to have type "AbelianGroup.sort ?G".
The LHS of plus_assoc (plus _ (plus _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of plus_opp_r (plus _ (opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of plus_zero_r (plus _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal
Found no subterm matching "plus (plus ?M6225 ?M6226) ?M6227" in the current goal.
Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
The LHS of plus_zero_r (plus _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : AbsRing x : K y : abs x = 0 H : forall r x0 y0 : ?G, plus x0 r = plus y0 r -> x0 = y0 H1 : forall r x0 y0 : ?G3, plus x0 r = plus y0 r -> x0 = y0 H0 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G2, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H4 : forall r x0 y0 : ?G8, plus x0 r = plus y0 r -> x0 = y0 H3 : forall x0 : ?G7, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H2 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G6, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H8 : forall x0 : ?G16, plus x0 zero = x0 H7 : forall r x0 y0 : ?G13, plus x0 r = plus y0 r -> x0 = y0 H6 : forall x0 : ?G12, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H5 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G11, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H12 : forall x0 : ?G22, plus x0 zero = x0 H11 : forall r x0 y0 : ?G19, plus x0 r = plus y0 r -> x0 = y0 H10 : forall x0 : ?G18, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H9 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G17, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H16 : forall x0 : ?G28, plus x0 zero = x0 H15 : forall r x0 y0 : ?G25, plus x0 r = plus y0 r -> x0 = y0 H14 : forall x0 : ?G24, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H13 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G23, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z H20 : forall x0 : ?G34, plus x0 zero = x0 H19 : forall r x0 y0 : ?G31, plus x0 r = plus y0 r -> x0 = y0 H18 : forall x0 : ?G30, plus x0 (opp x0) = zero H17 : forall x0 y0 z : ?G29, plus x0 (plus y0 z) = plus (plus x0 y0) z Unable to unify "plus ?M15449 ?M15450 = plus ?M15450 ?M15449" with "x = zero".

original: intros x y. apply plus_reg_r with (r := plus y (opp y)). rewrite plus_assoc. rewrite plus_opp_r. rewrite plus_zero_r. rewrite <- plus_assoc. rewrite <- plus_opp_r. rewrite plus_zero_r. apply plus_comm.
